QuestData.Title: Defenseless and Afraid
QuestData.Description: This is the battle that raged while I awaited the Genedar. So many ran to join me, but Kil'jaeden inspired still more to stand in their way.$b$bMy people were slaughtered without mercy.$b$bTo cover our retreat I ordered for this arena's defenses to be activated. It is clear that they were unable.$b$bTo turn the tide in this battle, to give these spirits rest, we must do what they could not. Find a way to activate the pylons.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Stolen Pylon Cores from enemies in Triumvirate's End and use them to activate 3 Ancient Pylons.
QuestData.RewardText: The tide is turning. We must press forward.
